subject: RE: [junit] Load Test Extension
msgSnippet: I thought I just read this.  Found it in DDJ: http://www.ddj.com/articles/2001/0102/0102toc.htm
messageBody:
I thought I just read this. Found it in DDJ:

http://www.ddj.com/articles/2001/0102/0102toc.htm

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Erik Meade [mailto:emeade@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, January 31, 2001 8:15 PM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [junit] Load Test Extension
>
>
> There is JUnit++ - Extending JUNIT to Integration, System, Load and
> Stress Testing by Siegfried GOESCHL which is available from
> http://www.geekfarm.org/emeade/junit/junit++.zip
>
> If you take a look at it, feedback to the list would be welcomed.
>
> --
> Erik Meade emeade@...
> Senior Consultant Object Mentor, Inc.
> http://www.junit.org
>
>
>
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: faisalm@... [mailto:faisalm@...]On
